t: What is OEM (original equipment manufacturer)? | Definition from TechTarget
s: The use of the term OEM in the hardware segment of the IT industry has several meanings. It can describe companies such as Dell Technologies, HP Inc., Hewlett-Packard Enterprise (HPE), Lenovo and Cisco Systems.
